description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Online deathmatch with avatars and tanks, up to 8 players! Use your big gun to explode the blocky world, or build anti-tank obstacles. Features bots for offline training.
description.short: Online deathmatch with avatars and tanks, up to 8 players! Use your big gun to explode the blocky world, or build anti-tank obstacles. Features bots for offline training.
